title: Best of the Program | Guests: Tim Ballard, Nancy & Leo Martin | 7/15/19
description:
Glenn's call for action begins today. Find out who is trying to take down all conservative media. Stand by, #SocialMediaSlavery is coming! Spinquark.com reveals just how stupid our government thinks the American people are. The Nazarene Fund update, with Tim Ballard from thenazarenefund.org.
